stateFromId.description: Id of the state this transition originates from.

stateToId.description: Id of the state this transition originates from.

duration.description: Duration of the trasition (mix time) in milliseconds or percentage (0-100) based on flags.

transitionOrder.description: Order value for sorting transitions in states.

exitTime.description: Duration in milliseconds that must elapse before allowing the state to change. If the flags mark this property as being percentage based, the value is in 0-100% of the outgoing animation's duration

interpolationType.description: The type of interpolation index in Interpolation applied to this state transition ('linear' by default).

interpolatorId.description: The id of the custom interpolator used when interpolation is Cubic.

randomWeight.description: Weight of the transition in the overall random options
